quote.text: Every push, every effort, every step takes you closer to becoming the best version of yourself. Embrace the journey of wellness.
quote.author: Unknown

workout.name: Planks
workout.description: Start in a high plank position with your palms flat on the floor, hands shoulder-width apart, and shoulders stacked directly above your wrists. Hold your body in a straight line from the top of your head through your heels. Hold this position for the duration.

workout.name: Sit-Ups
workout.description: Begin by lying on your back with your knees bent, feet flat on the ground, and your hands behind your head. Keeping your feet glued to the ground, slowly roll up from your head, then your neck, and then each vertebra in your spine, until you're sitting up.

workout.name: Push-Ups
workout.description: Start in a high plank position. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Pause, then push yourself back to the starting position. Keep your hips lifted and your core braced the entire time.

workout.name: Squats
workout.description: Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart. Hinge at your hips to push your butt back and lower down while keeping your chest up. Push your body back to the starting position.

workout.name: Lunges
workout.description: Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart. Take a step forward with your right foot and bend your right knee as you do so, stopping when your thigh is parallel to the ground. Push up off your right foot and return to the starting position. Repeat with your left leg.

workout.name: Jumping Jacks
workout.description: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides. Bend your knees slightly, and jump into the air. As you jump, spread your legs to be about shoulder-width apart. Stretch your arms out and over your head. Jump back to starting position.

workout.name: Burpees
workout.description: From a standing position, drop into a squat with your hands on the ground. Kick your feet back into a pushup position and immediately drop your chest to the floor. Bow your chest up as you return your feet back to the squat position as fast as possible. Jump up from the squat position.

breakfast.name: Summer Berry Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.description: A refreshing and nutrient-rich smoothie bowl packed with summer berries.
instructions: Blend the mixed berries, banana, almond milk, chia seeds and honey until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: A hearty salad with grilled chicken, fresh vegetables and a light vinaigrette.
instructions: Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Toss the mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber and red onion together.
Whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper.
Slice the grilled chicken and add to the salad.
Drizzle the vinaigrette over the salad before serving.

dinner.name: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa
dinner.description: Protein-rich grilled salmon served with a side of quinoa and seasonal vegetables.
instructions: Grill the salmon until cooked to your liking.
Boil the quinoa in water until fluffy.
Saute the mixed vegetables in olive oil.
Season the salmon, quinoa and vegetables with salt and pepper.
Serve the salmon with the quinoa and vegetables on the side.

quote.text: Every morning is a fresh start, an opportunity to nourish your body, cultivate your mind, and strengthen your spirit. Make it count.
quote.author: Unknown
